sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Bridge Program for Underrepresented Students Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Bridge Program for Underrepresented Students Act.

sections.heading: Program funding. Appropriations made available to a public university under this Act shall be utilized only for the following Bridge Program purposes:
sections.text: Program funding. Appropriations made available to a public university under this Act shall be utilized only for the following Bridge Program purposes:

sections.heading: Program personnel. Each public university that establishes  a Bridge Program shall designate a full-time Program director
sections.text: The Program director shall be responsible for the following:

sections.heading: Reporting.  A public university that has established a Bridge Program shall, on or before September 1, 2019 and on or before September 1 of each subsequent year, publish on its website and make available to the public a report for the previous fiscal year containing all of the following:
sections.text: Reporting. A public university that has established a Bridge Program shall, on or before September 1, 2019 and on or before September 1 of each subsequent year, publish on its website and make available to the public a report for the previous fiscal year containing all of the following:

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
